query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS injury_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  injuryType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  bodyPart VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('minor', 'moderate', 'severe') DEFAULT 'minor',
  description TEXT,
  injuryDate DATE NOT NULL,
  diagnosedBy VARCHAR(255),
  treatment TEXT,
  recoveryPlan TEXT,
  estimatedRecoveryDays INT,
  status ENUM('active', 'recovering', 'recovered') DEFAULT 'active',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
